title: Diploma in Airline Cabin Crew
headline: This free online course describes the duties of an airline crew member and explains how to become a flight attendant.
description: Professional and effective cabin crew members form the backbone of a successful airline. This course explores the roles of flight attendants and covers safety, emergency procedures and customer service. We also outline the perks of this exciting, fast-paced job to prepare you to work in the dynamic world of hospitality and travel. Sign up for this specialist hospitality course to learn how to provide first-class customer service in the sky.
courseDescription:
According to recent research, the flight attendant job market is expected to grow by 10.2% in the next five to ten years. This trend exists because cabin crew members are critical to providing passengers with a safe, comfortable and enjoyable flight experience. This hospitality course provides students with the skills and knowledge required to work as a flight attendant or cabin crew member in any aviation industry. We begin with a brief overview of the aircraft crew cabin's responsibilities and benefits. We identify various types of airlines and outline the roles of various regulatory bodies in ensuring compliance with safety rules.

Airline cabin crews play an important role in the aviation industry so human resources managers must choose them carefully. The course describes airline recruitment and training procedures and takes you through interview formats, aviation abbreviations and airport codes to give you an edge over the competition. We explore the components of an aircraft and the cabin, crew departments, the crew members' duties and the factors that influence the weather while flying. We show you how to conduct an emergency evacuation and use the relevant equipment. We also cover flight-related illnesses and explain how to provide first aid in an emergency.

Finally, the course examines the causes of fatigue in crew members and provides proven approaches to fatigue management designed to mitigate fatigue hazards. This course contains critical information for anyone interested in working as a cabin crew member or flight attendant. This diploma course provides the skills required to work effectively in a fast-paced and dynamic environment of air travel and as you offer passengers high levels of customer service and hospitality. Many people try to break into this exciting career field so sign up for this course to beat the competition and dazzle recruiters with your extra preparation.
